user_query: Could you please fetch the stock quotes for Apple (AAPL), Tesla (TSLA), and Google (GOOGL)? I'm interested in their real-time prices and trading volumes. Also, I would like to know the current circulation supply of ISLAMICOIN.

TaskList.description: Fetch real-time stock quotes for Apple (AAPL), Tesla (TSLA), and Google (GOOGL), including their prices and trading volumes.
Fetch the current circulation supply of ISLAMICOIN.
